
*************
dtxrd package
*************

:author: Stanislav Stoupin
:email:  <sstoupin@gmail.com>

Programs to support X-ray diffraction experiments

Provides
########

* :ref:`dtxrd`	      : dynamical x-ray diffraction calculator 
* :ref:`rcpeak`       : plot and calculate parameters of a reflectivity curve
* :ref:`rctopo`       : x-ray rocking curve image calculator (for a series of hdf4 CCD snapshots)
* :ref:`seehdf`       : hdf4 image data viewer
* :ref:`specscan`     : extract individual scans from a file generated by SPEC
* :ref:`throughput`   : calculate throughput of a multicrystal configuration 


Requires
########

:Numpy:      http://numpy.org
:Scipy:      http://scipy.org
:Matplotlib: http://matplotlib.org
